feature.label: OpenNTF Barista Feature
feature.description:
OpenNTF Barista - Code Completion for Managed Beans
Barista knows everything about your beans! Ok well, not everything, but it is a pretty good start.
Barista scans your faces-config.xml for any managed beans that you declare.
It will then provide codecompletion in the Server-side javascript editor. IT will also allow you to choose properties in the 'data pallete'
